EmailTemplate.name: Global_Product_Webinar_Pivotal HD Launch Session 2.No Show - Session 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you for the Exploring Pivotal HD Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Watch Our On Demand Broadcast. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We are sorry that we missed you at our initial kickoff to the "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webinar series last week, where we covered how to use the Pivotal HD Single Node (VM). An on demand broadcast (replay) is available here>> http://www.gopivotal.com/resources#http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotalvideo/Webinar-08062013-PHD.m4v.
If you haven't already, we'd like you to take the opportunity to download Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/pivotal-data-fabric/pivotal-hd> and Pivotal HD Community <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/pivotal-data-fabric/pivotal-hd>. Be a part of the discussion and join our Pivotal HD Discussion Group <http://discuss.gopivotal.com/categories/20112407-Pivotal-HD> and receive support from Pivotal and community experts.
Our next installment of our series, "Unstructured Data - Video Analytics on Hadoop <http://play.gopivotal.com/Global_Product_Webinar_UnstructuredDataSession2_Register.html>", takes place on Thursday September 5, 2013 at 9 AM PST/ 5PM GMT, where we will showcase how the Pivotal Data Science team is unlocking value from unstructured video and image data on Hadoop. Register Now <http://play.gopivotal.com/Global_Product_Webinar_UnstructuredDataSession2_Register.html>.
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:marketing@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team Stay current on all things Pivotal Visit our blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> Pivotal HD Community Forum Join Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>
